name: flowerpower
description: Serve index.html via Python http.server on localhost:3333 and open the browser

scripts.start: start "" cmd /c "timeout /t 1 >nul & start http://localhost:3333" & (py -m http.server 3333 --bind 127.0.0.1 || python -m http.server 3333 --bind 127.0.0.1 || python3 -m http.server 3333 --bind 127.0.0.1)
